issue.title: [CF 727] Protected function error
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 5.1.1.566, Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1

Installed Version

6.1.1

Description

Date: 2012-12-10 05:21:51 ID: 1 Error occured in: AddOn: TellMeWhen Count: 20 Message: Note: AddOn TellMeWhen attempted to call a protected function (OverrideActionBarButton5:Show()) during combat lockdown. Debug: [C]: Show() ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:268: ActionButton_Update() ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:511: ActionButton_OnEvent() ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:124: ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:117 comments.body:
Sorry, line breaks vanished with the curse client!


> Posted by CurseForge user Maven79

This is the result of Blizzard's buggy taint catcher. You may have noticed similar errors happening that are blamed on other addons (I certainly do when I am playing), but TellMeWhen isn't actually causing these at all.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
